main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) over Olean, New York, during March 1953.
interesting points: One observer reported a disc-shaped object moving North, changing colors from green to red to white,It made no sound and disappeared abruptly,Two observers saw a metallic, cigar-shaped object making a 90 degree turn at high speed,The report includes a total of 20 aerial sightings in New York State with the majority being attributed to natural phenomena or unidentified,The sightings were made by qualified observers and did not involve identifiable aircraft or celestial phenomena.
witness description: Two observers, Mr. and Mrs. James Harris
